name: HOMEFITNESS
0:
”Alexa open home fitness”
”Alexa ask home fitness for fat loss”
”Alexa ask home fitness for muscle gain”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home fitness
des: This skill provides you assistance throughout your workout and gives you different fitness program according to your fitness goal. This skill is flexible with different users. Multiple users can opt-in according to their own fitness goal at once. You just need to provide Alexa your fitness goal and a complete and effective workout would be provided and at the same time, the assistant will guide you throughout the workout. Even if you don’t have any knowledge about fitness this will mentor you to achieve what you really dreamt of. Most of the people don’t have time to join the gym because of their busy schedule this will provide you a good effective plan no matter what time of the day it is, your ever ready workout plan is there for you. Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
